009package Geometric_Operations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
013import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
014
015public class Draw_Test_Grid_Old implements PlugIn {
016        
017        static int w = 400;
018        static int h = 400;
019        static int xStep = 20;
020        static int yStep = 20;
021        static int xStart = 100;
022        static int yStart = 100;
023        static int xN = 10;
024        static int yN = 10;
025        
026        int foreground = 0;
027        int background = 255;
028        
029    public void run(String arg) {
030        ByteProcessor ip = new ByteProcessor(w,h);
031        ip.setValue(background);
032        ip.fill();
033        
034                ip.setValue(foreground);
035        int y = yStart;
036        int x1 = xStart;
037        int x2 = xStart+xN*xStep;
038        for (int j = 0; j <= yN; j++) {
039                        ip.drawLine(x1,y,x2,y);
040                        y = y + yStep;
041        }
042        
043                int x = xStart;
044                int y1 = yStart;
045                int y2 = yStart+yN*yStep;
046                for (int i = 0; i <= xN; i++) {
047                        ip.drawLine(x,y1,x,y2);
048                        x = x + xStep;
049                }
050                
051                ip.drawLine(0,0,w-1,h-1);
052                ip.drawOval(xStart, yStart, 200, 200);
053        
054        ImagePlus im = new ImagePlus("Grid",ip);
055        im.show();
056        //im.updateAndDraw();
057    }
058}
